name: InvolvedInLegalActionsOrProblems
title: Involved in Legal Actions or Problems
description: Indication of whether the person is involved in legal actions or is experiencing legal problems (Business ID: Entry 124328)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Involved in Legal Actions or Problems.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an indication of whether the person is involved in legal actions or is experiencing legal problems.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10CM codes for Involved in Legal Actions or Problems.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Involved in Legal Actions or Problems.)

contains.display: Conviction in civil and criminal proceedings without imprisonment
Problems related to other legal circumstances
